text: Nélson de Jesus SilvaFull name has been incorrectly given as Nelson Jesus Dida or Nelson Jesus da Silva. He was regularly called Nelson Dida by European media.Nelson Dida: Una storia incompleta (born 7 October 1973), better known simply as Dida, is a former Brazilian football player. == Career statistics == === Club === Club Season League Cup Continental Other Total Apps Apps Apps Apps Apps Vitória 1992 -
